Title: [docs] Literature review on AI-driven CAD assembly & ML-FEA models

Description: Compute part features for training ML model.

Title: [ml] Evaluate stress prediction accuracy on test set

Title: [plugin] Integrate model into plugin (export→predict→visualize)
